document.full_text: winnipeg easily cleared an important hurdle in its effort to secure the relocation of the atlanta thrashers with the sale of 13,000 season tickets, the nhl said on saturday.
document.title: winnipeg clears ticket hurdle in acquiring thrashers
lines_and_colors: winnipeg easily cleared an important hurdle in its effort to secure the relocation of the atlanta thrashers with the sale of 13,000 season tickets, the nhl said on saturday.
